attributes.additional_details: They are going to be tested like never before. Exhaustion, upheaval in their family and social lives. They are the absolute heart of this country. A pat on the back is nice but a pay rise and a bonus is better.
attributes.background: The Bankers get bonuses...and not just small ones. The NHS workers, council workers and delivery drivers are out there helping to save our lives whilst risking their own.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
